branchCategory.name: 90/91-C(D)A2, Air Cylinder Standard Type, Double Acting Single Rod
branchCategory.description: <p>Air cylinder series 90-CDA2 and 91-CDA2 has 5 bore sizes and can meet secondary battery manufacturing needs. 90-CDA2 is made from materials campatible with secondary battery manufacturing. 91-CDA2 also includes a "Lub-retainer" and is compatible with low dew point (40°C) applications. 7 mounting options are available. Auto switch capable.</p>

breadCrumb.name: 90/91-C(D)A2, Air Cylinder Standard Type, Double Acting Single Rod
